comments: "Kristin Gogolen-Wylie" (Is a great professor, she truly cares about her students! It\'s important to work together during group projects to pass. You will have to read a lot of information if you take her hybrid environmental science course, there is online and on campus work. I hope that helps!)

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: I would not recommend taking her class to ANYONE! The material discussed and test material do not necessarily correlate, she does not respond directly with questions, and often seemed preoccupied with something else. Not a good experience- there are WAY BETTER professors available!

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: There isn\'t enough room in this box to give professor Gogolen the credit she deserves! She was very helpful and an overall interesting person. I enjoyed her lectures. There were many quizzes, but that was beneficial in the long run since she drops the lowest 3-5. Her passion for the subject is contagious. I would recommend her to anyone!

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Kind, compassionate, friendly professor! Don\'t hesitate to ask any questions because she is there for you 100%. I had BIOL 1310 hybrid class with her and her responses to my emails were in a timely manner. I would recommend her to anyone if they wanted to take a BIOL 1310 hybrid class!

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: TONS AND TONS OF PAPER DUE ALMOST EVER CLASS SESSION! Expect to do 2 long paper, 15-20 assignments, 13 quizzes, and 2 EXAMS. Exam are 70+ questions and about 8-10 short answers. Too work for a nutrition course. She\'s a good instruction but just WAY TOO MUCH WORK!!!

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Too many discussions and assignments per week for an eight week course. Professor hardly ever, if ever responded to my emails. Would not recommend her!

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Best teacher I\'ve had at Macomb. She is kind, smart, and really gives you time and patience, which I need. The work is hard, but the exams are not bad if you study the proper amount of time. And do all the homework, helped ALOT. She is also pretty fair.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Somewhat easy class. All you have to do is the work and on time. The only issue I had was the quizzes were EXTREMELY hard, didn\'t have enough time and could only take them once. Overall she is a great professor. I earned a lot. She is involved with the class and you can see she is not in it just for a paycheck like some other online professors.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: A lot of material in a small amount of time. Gogolen gets through all of it. Such an outstanding professor. You cannot go wrong by taking her. Be prepared to work and study and spend time in the lab. She does her part incredibly well, shame on you if you have her and you don\'t do your part. Excellent prof.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: I loved this teacher! she was amazing and she\'s very smart. knows how to teach and explains the material veryyy well! i took her class during the summer semester and got a 97%. Deff recommend her to anyone going into the medical field:)

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Best science teacher I\'ve had. Really cares about her students. More than willing to spend extra time with you after class, in lab, or at office hours to ensure you understand the material. Exams are directly from the notes & she gives a lot of opportunities for extra credit. Tells you what to expect on exams. Very enthusiastic. Highly recommend!

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Kristin is nice and definitely knows her stuff. She is also passionate about this field. She does grade on a curve, but that doesn\'t mean her class is easy. She doesn\'t really do exam review though; of the three exams I\'ve taken only one had a review.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Very fair and always willing to help you to get the grade you want.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: need to participate in class and go to labs. she presents the material very enthusiastically, you can tell that she loves the subject and cares about biology. gives quizzes before class, but most likely tells you what it is on. you need to study and learn the material or you will not pass. STUDY STUDY STUDY.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Gogolen is a very, very smart professor. She isn\'t those types of professors that reads out loud of a book. This is not an easy class if you do not study. It obviously is if you do. Do NOT be lazy with this class! It will bite you back later. She is hard, but she is very nice and always willing to help. I like her a lot overall.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: I was a little unsure at the beginning of the class, but she knows her material and is helpful in lab. You have to study, this is not an easy class, if you want easy take the 2 classes elsewhere or put in the time and take this one class a MCCC

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: she\'s a really good teacher. all exam material was on the notes so the textbook wasn\'t really needed. you NEED to study the material to pass the class because there is a lot of information.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Took online nutrition class. Be prepared for at least 3-4 assignments each wk. DBs, quiz/exam, a few papers (not nec hard just tedious. Quizzes aren\'t that bad usually 10-15 ques, but TIMED (so are exams 40-60. Both have short essay questions. I didn\'t like all the work based on such LONG chaps and extremely BORING textbook. Teacher is a fair grader and responds to emails. Not a cake walk you will be doing some work but doable. I would go for one of the 8 wk courses cuz 16 wks was just too long.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Best science professor. She makes it extremely possible to pass this class. Extra credit at the end of the semester and easy credit doing the labs. The book for this class is completely unnecessary. She uses powerpoint and prints notes for the class to use during lecture.. test questions taken from powerpoint, not text book. Highly recommend.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Mrs. G was an awesome professor. Biology is my major so she made the work load easier to understand. Although it is not her fault, the biology department makes the tests 10 chapters long and it is a lot of information to obtain. Mrs. G\'s lectures were really clear, and understandable and always consistent.
